flawed_nl_solution:
Richard has scored 48 touchdowns because 14 x 6 = <<14*6=48>>48
To beat the record he must score 90 touchdowns because 89 + 1 = <<90=90>>90
He needs 42 more touchdowns to beat the record because 90 - 48 = <<42=42>>42
He has 2 games left because 16 - 14 = <<16-14=2>>2
He needs to average 21 touchdowns a game to beat the record because 42 / 2 = <<42/2=21>>21
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 84, not 48. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
